name: Zoxel (deus)
description:
Welcome to a world of infinite possibilities! Immerse yourself in a fully customizable voxel universe, where every pixel is yours to manipulate. With RPG mechanics and a unique voxel art style, our game offers an immersive gaming experience like no other.

Built with C SDL and Flecs libraries, this open-source game is available for all to modify with GPL3. Although the game is still in early development and currently only features a free-roam camera and UI, we are excited to announce that a first-person view will be added in the future.

Get ready to explore a vast world, build your own structures, battle ferocious monsters, and discover new territories, all from a first-person perspective. With regular updates and new features added all the time, you'll never run out of things to discover.

Join us on this exciting journey as we continue to develop and expand the game. So come, join the adventure and let your creativity run wild!
